recipe.title: Chocolate Milk Shake
ingredients: 1/2 cup nonfat or skim evaporated milk
2 crumbled chocolate chip or Oreo cookies
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and whip thoroughly. For a thicker milk shake, add an additional tablespoon or 2 of malted-milk powder until shake reaches desired thickness. (Each tablespoon adds 40 calories and 0.25 g fat per shake.)
